name: Teacher Rush: School Homework!
description:
Welcome to the best school with the coolest teacher ever! Start now a funny classroom adventure full of surprises!

It is hard to become children's best teacher... but it is worth a try! Get ready and prepare yourself for an amazing school day with your students!
Dress up with some cool school clothes and get the classroom ready for the lesson: Clean up the mess and leave it shining as if it were new! Do not forget to decorate using all your creativity and imagination turning an old classroom into a friendly and welcoming environment!

New students are arriving...let's welcome them and show them how cool is this school adventure! Help them to solve our mini-games and do not forget to take a picture with the funniest class ever!

It's time to teach: Make class lessons fun and do not let students get bored! Teach art, how to take care of class pets or write notes on the board! And the best part... Supervise and direct the school rock band! Isn't it amazing to have all these activities at school?

- Clean up the mess of the classroom and leave it ready to start the lesson!
- Prepare and distribute the meal at lunchtime with delicious food!
- Lead and direct the school rock band!
- Take care of the class pets!
- Enjoy teaching classes making it funny and entertaining!
- Mini-games included: Solve puzzles, matching games and much more in this educational game

Have you ever thought of improving your school! Get some ideas in this crazy classroom adventure! Become the kids’ favorite new teacher! You will love to go to school!
